Hello Nansi,

Thanks so much for bringing this to our attention, and for sharing the reference materials, that’s really helpful.
We’ll look into the logo corrections and the hook bin shape, and make sure everything is updated accordingly. Once all changes are complete, we’ll send the revised files back to you for review.

Always happy to help!

Hi all,

I'd like to bring to your attention the importance of checking the details. It is very important that every logo is correct on each bin size. Please use the logo file that I have previously sent over

2 Marrel logo is incorrect

3 Marrel logo is incorrect

4 Marrel logo is incorrect

6 Marrel logo is incorrect

Our Hook bins are a rectangle - they do not come up at the end. I have attached an image from one of our competitors, also it would be beneficial to review the image attached of our Hook truck with the skp bin on

Please amend and make changes, send back tome for review once all complete

Hi Nansi,

Thanks so much for confirming the colour scheme, really helpful!

Just checking, would something like this match what you had in mind? Preview link
  • Once you give the go-ahead, we’ll roll this out across the other bin types too.

Also, absolutely happy to hop on a call to discuss however, based on our experience with custom setups like phone bookings, we would really appreciate to have something like a quick Loom video walkthrough. It helps our dev team get a clear picture, keeps everything super efficient on both ends, and gives us something we can easily revisit anytime if questions come up later.

If you're happy to give that a go, here’s how to record one:
  • Head to loom.com and sign in or create a free account
  • Click “New Video” and choose Screen Only or Screen + Camera
  • Walk us through your setup and where things feel clunky
  • Loom will generate a link, just send that over whenever works

No pressure at all, just let us know what feels easiest, and we’re here to help with anything else you need.

This is the correct colour scheme if the bin is yellow - green kangaroo and black insert near the tail.

Also, if someone could give me a call to chat about the way our phone system works, it's a little messy for an email ..

Thankyou all



Nansi Philips

Hi Nansi,

Thanks for the feedback, really glad you’re liking the yellow one!

We’ll make the following updates:
  • Match the kangaroo exactly to your logo
  • Use decimal places across all dimensions
  • Reduce the dimensions font size slightly (1–2 points)

We’ll do our best to get all the bin size images over to you today. If not, we’ll make sure they’re with you early next week for review and approval before deployment.

Appreciate your feedback, will keep you posted!
